posts.post_content:
Hello All!!

I am interested in any t206 print scraps/missing color/ and the like...

Please email me any scans...thanks in advance for your time..:)


Respectfully,

Johnny

I know that t206museum.com had a few things recently for sale that fit your request, if that helps. I also have an Admiral Schlei so badly miscut top to bottom that no name is present, if you're interested.

JP,

Thanx for the reply!!i'm not interested in the miscut, but thanx anyway!!

Regards

Johnny

i have a dode paskert t206 with no name and factory number on ebay right now
ebay# 290421771698

Hi Johnny
Are you interested in upside down backs. If so let me know.
Mike

MIKE!!

HI!! awesome cards, i'll send u an email..

Peace

Johnny
